articles.title: Harry Kane has England goal-scoring record but needs trophies - ESPN India
articles.description: Harry Kane has broken Wayne Rooney's scoring record for England, but his career also serves as a warning. The striker needs to win trophies.
articles.content:
Harry Kane has eclipsed Wayne Rooney to become England's all-time top goal scorer, but he is still battling to avoid the same fate as his predecessor.
